title: 3T 60th Anniversary Dreambox is an insane $20k Motorized Bike Garage w/ Racemax Exploro inside
content:
There are limited edition anniversary bikes, and then there is the 3T Dreambox. An admittedly over-the-top tribute to all things Italian, the Dreambox is an all-in-one kit that will have you ready to ride in extremely limited style.
